conversation.content: Hi, I called last week about... what's the word... a recurring billing issue? Need to make sure someone actually wrote it down.
Oh absolutely. Let me. Pull that up. Account number? Actually wait. Phone number works too. Whatever's easiest for you right now.

Because. Right now. While we're talking. Setting reminder. My personal calendar. Thursday. Two PM. If billing hasn't processed. I'm walking it. To their desk. Myself.
